Description: Fragment of flaring, 'sofa' rim and ring foot of Corinthian black-figured pottery plate; light groove near edge of rim; black band on edge of rim and four on underside; outside of foot glazed with added red band, stand surface worninside and underside of foot glazed with remains of added red band; on top of rim, between bands, cable pattern with incised outline and spoked centres.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GB.119) (Phase 1)
